info.author: Michel Lang
info.description:
A small and simple python-script using feedparser to download torrents of your 
favourite tv shows from Seriesly.com to a local folder. Best to use in 
conjunction with cron and a torrent-client with folder watching capabilities like 
rtorrent.
info.keywords: rss feed cli torrent seriesly tvshows cron
info.name: seriesly-downloader
